objects.text:
• German Polycarbonate Shell
• Front Quick-Access Design
• USB Charging Port & TSA Lock

product_details.description: Accessibility just made a move to the next level. No cap. Our classic Cabin Luggage has now evolved! The Cabin Pro is designed for quick access to help you breeze through security. UNDESTRUCTABLE GERMAN MARKLON POLYCARBONATE SHELL: Casing: Hard LIGHTWEIGHT & INDUSTRY BEST STORAGE: Capacity: 40liter, Weight: 3.65 grams, Dimension : 57.8 x 37 x 24.3 cm SILENT RUN JAPANESE WHEEL TECHNOLOGY: Number of wheels: 8, Super Smooth Hinomoto Wheels THE MOST FEATURE RICH LUGGAGE: USB Port: 1, Powerbank not included, Lock Type: TSA Number Lock, Comes with magic eraser, Dust Bag & Laundry Bag Water resistant: Yes Outer material - Polycarbonate ** Water resistance level - Water Resistant **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and bold layout divided vertically into two sections. The left side showcases a deep green background with stylized circular patterns and a geometric footer, overlaid with four main text elements - a large bold title (*id: heading*), a futuristic subheading (*id: subheading*), a short bullet-point feature list (*id: description*), and a highlighted product price (*id: price*) in large yellow typography. A rectangular call-to-action button (*id: cta_button*) with a contrasting text label (*id: cta*) sits below the price. The right section is a clean light-gray space displaying a high-quality image of the product (*id: product_image*), slightly overlapping into the text area, creating a dynamic visual hierarchy.  

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Green: `#2C3A2E`  
- Dark Olive: `#1A231B`  
- Golden Yellow: `#FFC107`  
- Light Yellow: `#FFD54F`  
- Soft Grey Background: `#F5F5F5`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image features a modern suitcase designed with a sleek olive green exterior (#4B5A40), contrasted sharply with vibrant mustard yellow accents (#F4B400). Black elements (#1C1C1C) such as the handle, locks, and wheels add depth and boldness. The yellow interior with white grid patterns (#FFF9E5) adds a modern, dynamic touch, enhancing visual interest. The color palette balances warmth and utility, suggesting both style and durability. The blending of the muted green body with high-contrast yellow strips and interior creates a visually stimulating look, ideal for an ad banner targeting young, professional travelers who value both function and flair.
